nodes.bodyText:
Do we need both a solid and outlined star here?
https://fontawesome.com/icons/star?style=regular
https://fontawesome.com/icons/star?style=solid
nodes.diffHunk:

             <ButtonGroup>
               <>
                 <Button title={title} ref={(elem) => { this.formTarget = elem; }} onClick={this.toggleFormModal}>
-                  <Icon style={{ color: savedSearchColor }} name={savedSearchStyle} /> Save

nodes.bodyText:
Thanks again for the hint, I've added the ability to outline icons and updated the icons which had -o in their name.
I've changed the Icon props interface in the same step, I think it is now easier to understand, but it would be great to hear your opinion. There are no changes needed in our plugins.
